mapper.insert: insert into moocactiviti.user (name, username, password, roles, email, is_subscribe) values (#{name}, #{username}, #{password}, #{access}, #{email}, #{isEmail})
mapper.update: #更新用户信息 update moocactiviti.user set name=#{name}, email=#{email}, username=#{username}, is_subscribe=#{isEmail}, roles=#{access} where username = #{username}
mapper.select: select id, name, username, roles, email, is_subscribe from moocactiviti.user
